alutha pathkerunu mema niladharingen dasa denekma wideshayanhi sita nawatha meratata paminiye janapathiwaranaya awasanwuwayin pasuwaya.sarath fonseka mahatha madihathwa owunta nawa janapathi sirisena hamuwimata awasthawa salasa dun athara owunwa nawatha dhurayanhi pihituwannatath owunta himi dimana ha warapa්rasada labadennatath janapathiwaraya adala ansha walata niyoga kaleya.yapanaya aarakshaka sena adhipathi lesa mejar jenaral nandana udawaththa ha nagenahira anadenna lesa mejar jenaral janaka walgama pathkirima nawa pathkirim athara thawath pa්radhana thanathuru wenaswim dekaki.hamuda buddhi anshayata sidukerena nawa pathkirim gana methek sadahanak nomatha.gewunu samaye ek balaaniyaka sita bala ani 7 k dakwa wardhayawa thibena hamuda buddhi anshaya sambandhayen labi thibena warthada etharam yahapath nowe.uthuru ha nagenahira kalapawala janajiwithayata badha genadena ayurin meheyum katayuthuwala yedunu bawata eeta chodana nagi thibe.polis niladharingen sadumlath rate pa්radhana buddhi anshaya wana siwil buddhi anshaye wagakim ha wadarajakari hamuda buddhi anshaya thaman athata pawaragena siti bawatada chodana nagi atha.piris balaya athinda dan hamuda buddhi anshaya siwil buddhi anshayata wada shakthimathya.me siyalla salaku wita rate nila buddhi sewaya wana siwil buddhi anshaya danata sitinne hamuda buddhi anshaya hamuwe dewani thanata watiya.

siya pemwathiya barapathala lingika apayojanayata lak kirimata waradakaru wu pudgalayakuta halawatha mahadhikaranaya wisin niyama kala wasara hathaka barapathala wada sahitha sira daduwama iwath kala abhiyachanadhikaranaya ee wenuwata wasara dekahamaraka barapathala wada sahitha sira daduwam niyama kala athara ema wasara dahayakata athahitu wana ladi.ema apayojana siddhiya pilibanda panilla ema siddhiyen wasara dekakata pasu wa sidu kirimath , prema sambandhaya pawathwana kalayedi dedenage kamaththa athiwa me siduwima siduwimath yana karunu awadhanayata ganimin melesa athhitawu sira daduwam niyama karana bawa abhiyachanadhikaranaya wisin sandahan kara atha.thamata sira daduwam niyama kala nadu thinduwata erehiwa withthikaru gonu kala abhiyachana pethsamaka wibhagaya awasan kara ehi thinduwa prakasha karamin abhiyachanadhikarana winisuruwarun wana sisira da aabaෲ saha chandra jayathilaka yana mahathwaru me bawa sandahan kara atha.mita amatharawa rupiyal dasa dahasaka saha rupiyal laksha dekahamaraka wandi mudal gewana lesada ema nogewanne nam masa hayaka menma wasara dekaka sira daduwam niyama karamin halawatha mahadhikaranaya wisin panawana lada niyogaya elesama kriyathmaka wana bawa da ema thinduwehi dakwe.

balala karana wilasitha hariyata dan inna ape mami wage, janayata kanna nathiwa mirikeddi, kampas wala lamayi thamange patamalawanta watinakamak illaddi, kannangara mahaththaya genapu nidahas adhyapanaya es bi wikunan kaddi ane me balala dakinne uge sihinaya pamanamayi, uuta gowipala mathak wenne mokak hari ota labena sapa adu wunama, ethakota paramparawadhaya asse yatin yana anith parampara wdhayath niyamayi, despaluwonge lamayinuth deshapalanayata ena hati, sanstha samagam wala loku putu un un athare bedi yaddi ow me kathawa hariyatama hari.

eesiyan elayans nawa shakhawa minuwangodaeeshiyan elayans rakshana samagame shakha jalaya thawa duratath pulul karamin siya 30 wani pradeshiya karyalaya 86/1, palamu mahala, weyangoda para, minuwangoda di pasugiyada wiwrutha karana ladi.minuwangoda di wiwrutha wu eeshiyan elayans nawa karyalaya shighrayen diyunu wana pradeshaye rakshana awashyatha sandaha siya sewa sapayime aramunen palapurudu karya mandalayak ha nawina thakshana sewa pahasukam rasak da sahithawa sthapanaya kara atha.minuwangoda nagaradhipathi fedrik alahakon mahatha, eeshiyan elayans rakshana samagame minuwangoda pradeshiya kalamanakara ruwan kumara, alewi kalamanakara mihilal nishantha, pradhana meheyum niladhari chula hettiaarachchi (jiwitha rakshana) mahathwarun nawa karyalaya wiwrutha karamin.nepalaye kathmandu nuwaradi pawathi prathama dakunu aasiyathika wolibol tharagawaliye shurathawaya dina ganimata shri lanka jathika wolibol kandayama samath wiya.ema kandayama niyojanaya kala shri lanka siwil guwan sewa adhikaraye sewaya karana kosala eekanayaka hondama pahara walakanna lesa sammanaya dina gaththeya.
mehi siti kumaradasa raju ha kalidasa kawiya athara thibune mithrathwayaki.
